title: sakrecoer
author: sakrecoer
content: This year we'll try to be more active here on Bitcointalk. Alephium is open source, so you can always follow the development on: https://github.com/alephium/ but for everyone who doesn't have the time or bandwidth to do so, we'll post progress in this thread! Here's the first one for 2023:üåê Backend Team‚Ä¢ Add difficulty metrics‚Ä¢ Remove random execution of transactions‚Ä¢ Merge bug fixes from wormhole official repo‚Ä¢ Fix port boud bug‚Ä¢ Several security improvements for the bridge infrastructure‚Ä¢ More operational runbooks for the bridge infrastructure‚Ä¢ Upgrade the bridge to the latest dApp stack‚Ä¢ Add Router contract for DEX‚Ä¢ Design and implement the last missing parts of Leman upgrade‚Ä¢ Update ralph-vscode plugin‚Ä¢ Working on DEX contracts and UI. The UI now supports swap, add/remove liquidity, and add token pool.üåç Frontend TeamDesktop wallet v2.0 üñ•Ô∏è‚Ä¢ Fetching price from coingecko‚Ä¢ Implemented new side navigation‚Ä¢ Implemented simple notifications modal‚Ä¢ Started working on new addresses page layoutExplorer üî≠‚Ä¢ Fixed transactions table UI bug and deployed on testnet and mainnet: https://github.com/alephium/explorer/issues/158

comments.author: sakrecoer
comments.body: Ack... seems like i accidentally posted in the wrong sub-forum, but i can't delete until 24h have pasted.¬†  I'm very sorry about this. Will clean up and move to https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=67.0 ASAP.
